Package com.varukha.webproject.model.connection

Class ConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
com.varukha.webproject.model.connection.ConnectionPool
public class ConnectionPool extends Object
Class ConnectionPool obtain realization of custom connection pool with blocking queue and queue for given away connections and ready to given away connections.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dmytro Varukha

      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • ConnectionPool

      private ConnectionPool()
      Method ConnectionPool used to create connection pool by specified connection pool size. In order to ensure secure access to connection is used proxy connection that takes the real connection as an attribute.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ConnectionPool getInstance()
      Method getInstance used to get an instance of connection that was created.
      Returns:
      the instance of connection.

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection()
      Method getConnection used to get connection from created connection pool. Using method take() provides thread safe if two connections will arrive and will not allow two streams to take the same connection. Also, if the connection pool will be empty it will be waited when connection will put.
      Returns:
      connection from connection pool.

    • releaseConnection

      public void releaseConnection(Connection connection)
      Method releaseConnection used to release connection back to connection pool.

    • destroyPool

      public void destroyPool()
      Method destroyPool used to destroy connection pool when web application is shutting down and unregister JDBC driver when the web application was stopped.

    • closeAnyConnection

      private void closeAnyConnection()
      Method closeAnyConnection used to close any connections.

    • deregisterDrivers

      private void deregisterDrivers()
      Method deregisterDrivers used to unregister JDBC driver when the web application was stopped.
